name: Idris Jalali
story: Luqman was born and raised in a small village in rural Iran. He joined the military at 18 and has served as a Combat Life Saver ever since. His medical training has saved countless lives on the battlefield, earning him the nickname 'Angel of Death' among his comrades. Luqman is deeply devoted to his faith and family, and hopes to one day return home to start a family of his own.
